name: Mini Arcade
description: I'm a maker and I enjoy building something with my own two hands. This is a mini-arcade machine that I build using a Raspberry Pi and various prototyping techniques.

name: Vintage Computers
description: I have a passion for vintage computers and video game consoles. They hold a special kind of magic that I enjoy keeping alive using my electronics background.

name: Sound Design
description: As a sound designer and composer, I enjoy experimenting with creating audio for games, music, videos, and live theatre. I've also been involved in creating virtual instruments and sampling projects.
